net.lightstone.model
Class Chunk

java.lang.Object
  net.lightstone.model.Chunk

public final class Chunk
extends Object

Represents a chunk of the map.

Author:
Graham Edgecombe

Nested Class Summary
static class Chunk.Key
          A chunk key represents the X and Z coordinates of a chunk and implements the Chunk.Key.hashCode() and Chunk.Key.equals(Object) methods making it suitable for use as a key in a hash table or set.
